message: I propose a fair split, giving you 10% and keeping 90% for myself. Let's end this quickly.
Alice, your offer was quite harsh! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor.  Consider the decreasing value of the money - a deal now is better than risking further inflation.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 55/45 in my favor. Remember, with every round, the value of the money decreases, and we both lose.  Let's make this deal and avoid further losses.
